content.S: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife...

snippet.S: It is a truth universally acknowledged...

content.S: Call me Ishmael. Some years ago—never mind how long precisely—having little or no money in my purse...
My father's family name being Pirrip, and my Christian name Philip, my infant tongue could make of both names nothing longer or more explicit than Pip...

snippet.S: My father's family name being Pirrip...

content.S: On the 24th of February, 1815, the look-out at Notre-Dame de la Garde signalled the three-master, the Pharaon from Smyrna, Trieste, and Naples.

snippet.S: On the 24th of February, 1815, the look-out at Notre-Dame de la Garde signalled the three-master, the Pharaon from Smyrna, Trieste, and Naples.

content.S: Well, Prince, so Genoa and Lucca are now just family estates of the Buonapartes.

snippet.S: Well, Prince, so Genoa and Lucca are now just family estates of the Buonapartes.

content.S: Alexey Fyodorovitch Karamazov was the third son of Fyodor Pavlovitch Karamazov, a landowner well known in our district in his own day, and still remembered among us.

snippet.S: Alexey Fyodorovitch Karamazov was the third son of Fyodor Pavlovitch Karamazov, a landowner well known in our district in his own day, and still remembered among us.

content.S: Stately, plump Buck Mulligan came from the stairhead, bearing a bowl of lather on which a mirror and a razor lay crossed.

snippet.S: Stately, plump Buck Mulligan came from the stairhead, bearing a bowl of lather on which a mirror and a razor lay crossed.

content.S: 1801—I have just returned from a visit to my landlord—the solitary neighbour that I shall be troubled with.

snippet.S: 1801—I have just returned from a visit to my landlord—the solitary neighbour that I shall be troubled with.

content.S: Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

snippet.S: Happy families are all alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

content.S: On the 24th of February, 1810, the look-out at Notre-Dame de la Garde signalled the three-master, the Pharaon from Smyrna, Trieste, and Naples.

snippet.S: On the 24th of February, 1810, the look-out at Notre-Dame de la Garde signalled the three-master, the Pharaon from Smyrna, Trieste, and Naples.
